00224 
00225 
00229     bool isInQuota(const SUMOReal frac) const {
00230         if (MSGlobals::gFractions.find(frac) == MSGlobals::gFractions.end()) {
00231             return (myLoadedVehNo - 1) % 1000 < (unsigned int)(frac * 1000.);
00232         }
00233         return (myLoadedVehNo - 1) % MSGlobals::gFractions[frac].second < MSGlobals::gFractions[frac].first;
00234     }
00235 
00236 
00241     int getActiveVehicleCount() const {
00242         return myLoadedVehNo - (myWaitingForPerson + myEndedVehNo);
00243     }
